channel.title: AN idea
channel.description: Not a procedure yet. But I'm thinking about one to help walking from point a to point b to point c and so on and so on, TREMENDOUSLY!!! The Idea is simple. First we load up the map into a bitmap then it looks at the minimap and finds certain coordinates...hard to explain...need to explain it better(it will be like using aryan)
